snippet: The harpsichordist Mahan Esfahani performed at the Frick Collection on Sunday, featuring works by Bach and Byrd.
abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews recital by harpsichordist Mahan Esfahani at the Frick Collection.
lead_paragraph: The harpsichordist Mahan Esfahani performed at the Frick Collection on Sunday, featuring works by Bach and Byrd.

headline.seo: Mahan Esfahani at the Frick Collection
headline.main: At Some Recitals, It’s All About the Encore
